title: ClickHouse Cluster Configuration
description: Configuration schema for the ClickHouse Helm chart.

version.title: ClickHouse Cluster Version
version.description: Engine Version of the ClickHouse cluster.

mode.title: Cluster Topology Mode
mode.description: Define the ClickHouse cluster topology mode.

shards.title: Shard Count
shards.description: Number of shards in the ClickHouse cluster.

cpu.title: CPU Request
cpu.description: The amount of CPU requested for each ClickHouse instance, can be a number or string with units.

memory.title: Memory(Gi)
memory.description: The amount of memory requested for each ClickHouse instance, unit is Gi.

storageClassName.title: Storage Class Name
storageClassName.description: Kubernetes storage class name to use for persistent volumes.

storage.title: Storage(Gi)
storage.description: Size of the persistent storage volume in Gi.

storageClassName.title: Keeper Storage Class Name
storageClassName.description: Kubernetes storage class name for keeper persistent volumes.

cpu.title: Keeper CPU Request
cpu.description: The amount of CPU requested for each ClickHouse Keeper instance, can be a number or string with units.

memory.title: Keeper Memory(Gi)
memory.description: The amount of memory requested for each ClickHouse Keeper instance, unit is Gi.

storage.title: Keeper Storage(Gi)
storage.description: Size of the keeper's persistent storage volume in Gi.

tolerations.title: Keeper Tolerations
tolerations.description: List of tolerations for scheduling ClickHouse Keeper pods.

type.title: Service Type
type.description: Type of service to expose ClickHouse. Valid options are 'ExternalName', 'ClusterIP', 'NodePort', and 'LoadBalancer'.

serviceAccount.title: Service Account
serviceAccount.description: Configuration for the Kubernetes Service Account used by the ClickHouse components.

name.title: Service Account Name
name.description: Name of the service account to create or use.

tls.title: TLS Configuration
tls.description: Settings for TLS configuration of the ClickHouse cluster.

enabled.title: TLS Enabled
enabled.description: Enable or disable TLS for the ClickHouse cluster.

issuer.title: TLS Issuer
issuer.description: Issuer type for TLS certificates. Options are 'KubeBlocks' or 'UserProvided'.

secretName.title: TLS Secret Name
secretName.description: Name of the secret containing the TLS certificate when using UserProvided issuer.
